items.name: First-Time Buyer Seminar
items.location: Pinnacle Realty Group Office — 123 Main Street, Middletown NY
items.description: Join us for a free two-hour seminar covering everything first-time buyers need to know: pre-approval, the offer process, inspections, closing costs, and what to expect in today's Westchester market. Light breakfast provided.

items.name: Westchester Real Estate Investment Forum
items.location: Pinnacle Realty Group Office — 123 Main Street, Middletown NY
items.description: An evening for serious investors exploring Westchester County's multifamily, commercial, and single-family investment market. Sarah Rodriguez will present current cap rate data, rental yield analysis, and off-market opportunities. RSVP required — limited seating.

items.name: Spring Market Open House Weekend
items.description: Our annual open house weekend featuring all active Pinnacle Realty Group listings. Visit multiple properties in a single weekend, meet our agents, and get a firsthand look at this spring's inventory.
